elements.label: Dat TiddlyWiki
elements.Description1: An experiment in creating peer-to-peer TiddlyWiki documents that can be updated from multiple devices and by multiple people
elements.Description2: This is mostly an experiment using some cutting-edge peer-to-peer software libraries. I built it to scratch a personal itch. I use it myself to store personal notes and bits of information I'd like to share on multiple devices.
elements.Participation URL: Fritter! dat://fritter.hashbase.io (in Beaker Browser) ... but I'm active on Twitter too... https://twitter.com/jimpick
elements.Regional Traction: Mostly myself. I few people have tried it out.
elements.description:
#Peer-to-Peer Tiddlywikis
##About Dat TiddlyWiki
![About Dat TiddlyWiki]()
 ###An experiment in creating peer-to-peer TiddlyWiki documents that can be updated from multiple devices and by multiple people
This is mostly an experiment using some cutting-edge peer-to-peer software libraries. I built it to scratch a personal itch. I use it myself to store personal notes and bits of information I'd like to share on multiple devices.

elements.label: Jolocom
elements.Description1: Jolocom delivers a protocol for people, organizations and machines to autonomously create, manage, and share digital identities.
elements.Description2:
We use blockchain and other decentralized technologies to build a virtual infrastructure that supports self-sovereign identity management by any subject, entity, or object connected to a network. The open source protocol is a universal framework for identity interactions over the internet and is designed to drive adoption of self-sovereign identity
at global scale as a common resource.
Anyone and anything with an identity - companies, consumers, public institutions, state citizens, machines - benefits from a system that allows subjects of identity to control and truly own their digital selves. Jolocom’s protocol for self-sovereign identity management finally makes it possible.
Organizations of any size can easily deploy our identity management tools to optimize internal and consumer-facing identity verification & access right needs, and ordinary individuals can easily use our tools to store, share, and maintain exclusive control over their personal data and identity attributes. Our protocol even supports machine identity interactions in IoT environments. Whether you’re an individual, organization, or machine, Jolocom helps put you in control of your digital self.
elements.Open feedback: thx so much for this great initiative :)
elements.Suggested Groups: businesses, organizations, public sector, sharing economy, mobility, internet of things
elements.description:
#own your digital self
##About Jolocom
![About Jolocom](https://www.youtube.com/embed/7ySkqG24Atk)
 ###Jolocom delivers a protocol for people, organizations and machines to autonomously create, manage, and share digital identities.
We use blockchain and other decentralized technologies to build a virtual infrastructure that supports self-sovereign identity management by any subject, entity, or object connected to a network. The open source protocol is a universal framework for identity interactions over the internet and is designed to drive adoption of self-sovereign identity
at global scale as a common resource.
Anyone and anything with an identity - companies, consumers, public institutions, state citizens, machines - benefits from a system that allows subjects of identity to control and truly own their digital selves. Jolocom’s protocol for self-sovereign identity management finally makes it possible.
Organizations of any size can easily deploy our identity management tools to optimize internal and consumer-facing identity verification & access right needs, and ordinary individuals can easily use our tools to store, share, and maintain exclusive control over their personal data and identity attributes. Our protocol even supports machine identity interactions in IoT environments. Whether you’re an individual, organization, or machine, Jolocom helps put you in control of your digital self.

elements.label: Subutai(tm) Blockchain Router
elements.Description1: 18 Watt Broadband Router (Hardwired ETHERNET and 802.11b/g/n), RAID enhanced Networks Attached Storage (NAS), IoT gateway, green cryptocurrency mining, TPM Ultra-Security
elements.Description2: A highly efficient (18 Watt) and expandable broadband router that is also an IoT gateway, NAS server, and cryptocurrency mining system that uses an FPGA for efficient and flexible mining.  Using a TPM processor it inspects every packet passing through the system for malware using fuzzy logic.
elements.Suggested Groups: Internet service providers, telecoms, electric utilities, social programs (providing low-cost or free Internet to people)
elements.description:
#
##About Subutai(tm) Blockchain Router
![About Subutai(tm) Blockchain Router]()
 ###18 Watt Broadband Router (Hardwired ETHERNET and 802.11b/g/n), RAID enhanced Networks Attached Storage (NAS), IoT gateway, green cryptocurrency mining, TPM Ultra-Security
A highly efficient (18 Watt) and expandable broadband router that is also an IoT gateway, NAS server, and cryptocurrency mining system that uses an FPGA for efficient and flexible mining.  Using a TPM processor it inspects every packet passing through the system for malware using fuzzy logic.

elements.label: The hi:project
elements.tag line: empowering you, empowering us all, with a more human web
elements.Description1: The way a machine or service helps you accomplish tasks with or through it, that’s the user interface. The way your software helps you accomplish tasks with other software, that’s the human interface.
elements.Description2:
[The hi:project](https://hi-project.org/) is a nonprofit, free, open-source engineering program formed to create a more human-centric web, open and accessible to all. Endorsed by the [Web Science Trust](http://www.webscience.org/), we’re currently building a community of interested parties, preparing to develop a technical proof of concept.

The project helps: 
* secure a citizen-centric Internet (redecentralizing)
* solve personal data & privacy
* transform accessibility & digital inclusion.
elements.description:
#empowering you, empowering us all, with a more human web
##About The hi:project
![About The hi:project](https://www.youtube.com/embed/oh5QuaYs49c)
 ###The way a machine or service helps you accomplish tasks with or through it, that’s the user interface. The way your software helps you accomplish tasks with other software, that’s the human interface.
[The hi:project](https://hi-project.org/) is a nonprofit, free, open-source engineering program formed to create a more human-centric web, open and accessible to all. Endorsed by the [Web Science Trust](http://www.webscience.org/), we’re currently building a community of interested parties, preparing to develop a technical proof of concept.

The project helps: 
* secure a citizen-centric Internet (redecentralizing)
* solve personal data & privacy
* transform accessibility & digital inclusion.

elements.label: UBOS
elements.tag line: Linux distro for personal servers and Indie IoT devices
elements.Description1: Makes administration of user-owned servers much simpler
elements.Description2: Want to keep your data at home instead of handing it over to a cloud overlord? But dreading server maintenance. UBOS makes it simple.
